p: In recent years, studies on intergenerational rearing problems have received increasing attention globally, and two contrary views regarding the influence of grandchildren rearing on grandparents exist. Some research has shown that it has a positive effect on the physical and mental health of the elderly ( 2, 3). However, other studies have demonstrated its negative impact on grandparents; this is because the investment of time, physical strength, and emotions lead to early retirement and psychological pressures such as loneliness and trepidation ( 4â€“ 6).
